content.text: How do we get from a blank screen to a search result? This involves the 'Home' experience and the methods for entering queries.
content.hook: The search box is a window to the world. Let's design it right.

content.text: Where search begins. 1. Search Box (Empty state): High intent, requires knowledge of terms. 2. Browsing/Directory: Low intent, exploring categories. 3. Recommendations: Passive start.
content.hook: Starting points set the tone for the information journey.

slides.title: Query Specification Methods
items: Text Input: The classic search bar.
Voice Input: Natural language via speech recognition.

content.text: How systems help you ask. 1. Autocorrect/Suggest: Predictive typing. 2. Query expansion suggestions. 3. Filters during input (e.g. searching 'Movies' vs 'Actors').
content.hook: A good specifier reduces the 'Gulf of Execution'.
